SELECT COMP_CODE , BSNS_CODE , CHILD_CODE , CHILD_NAME , CHILD_REG_NUMB_1 , CHILD_REG_NUMB_2 , CHILD_ADMISSION_DATE , CHILD_GRADUATION_DATE , CHILD_ZIPCODE , CHILD_ADDR , CHILD_DETAIL_ADDR , CHILD_STATUS , ROOM_CODE , (SELECT ROOM_NAME FROM AC_ROOM_INFO WHERE COMP_CODE = ACI.COMP_CODE AND BSNS_CODE = ACI.BSNS_CODE AND ROOM_CODE = ACI.ROOM_CODE ) AS ROOM_NAME , CHILD_REG_DATE , CHILD_MOD_DATE , CHILD_MOD_USER , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM DF_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = CHILD_MOD_USER ) AS CHILD_MOD_USER_NAME FROM AC_CHILD_INFO ACI WHERE COMP_CODE = #{comp_code} AND BSNS_CODE = #{bsns_code}
AND ${keyword_column} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT COMP_CODE , BSNS_CODE , CHILD_CODE , CHILD_NAME , CHILD_REG_NUMB_1 , CHILD_REG_NUMB_2 , CHILD_ADMISSION_DATE , CHILD_GRADUATION_DATE , CHILD_ZIPCODE , CHILD_ADDR , CHILD_DETAIL_ADDR , CHILD_STATUS , ROOM_CODE , CHILD_REG_DATE , CHILD_MOD_DATE , CHILD_MOD_USER , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM DF_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = CHILD_MOD_USER ) AS CHILD_MOD_USER_NAME FROM AC_CHILD_INFO WHERE COMP_CODE = #{comp_code} AND BSNS_CODE = #{bsns_code}
AND CHILD_CODE = #{child_code}
